languages.text:
This creature gains immunity to {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g}.
It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: Существо получает иммунитет к ужасам варпа. Каждый раз получая {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или находясь под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морока{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}, это существо получает один уровень темного благословения.

traits.locale_text: This creature gains immunity to Horrors of the Warp. It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

This creature gains immunity to Horrors of the Warp. It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

This creature gains immunity to Horrors of the Warp. It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text:
Существо получает иммунитет к {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасам варпа{/g}.
Каждый раз получая {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или находясь под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морока{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}, это существо получает один уровень темного благословения.

It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Существо получает иммунитет к {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасам варпа{/g}.
Каждый раз получая {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или находясь под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морока{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}, это существо получает один уровень темного благословения.

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur erhält Immunität gegen {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Schrecken des Warp{/g}.
Sie bekommt +1 "Dunkler Segen", wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} erleidet oder von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomenen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} beeinflusst wird.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains immunity to {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g}.
It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erlangt Immunität gegen die Schrecken des Warp. Sie bekommt jedes Mal +1 von Dunkler Segen aufaddiert, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} erleidet oder von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomenen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} beeinflusst wird.

languages.text:
Cette créature devient invulnérable à {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horreurs du Warp{/g}.
Elle bénéficie de +1 cumul de Bénédiction des ténèbres chaque fois qu'elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} ou qu'elle est affectée par des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains immunity to {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g}.
It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature devient invulnérable à Horreurs du Warp. Elle bénéficie de +1 cumul de Bénédiction des Ténèbres chaque fois qu'elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} ou qu'elle est affectée par des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text:
此生物对{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}亚空间的恐怖{/g}免疫。
每当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，或受到{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}影响，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}影响时，都会获得1层“黑暗祝福”层数。
languages.original_text:
This creature gains immunity to {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g}.
It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物对亚空间的恐怖免疫。 每当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，或受到{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}影响，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}影响时，都会获得1层“黑暗祝福”层数。

languages.text:
Esta criatura gana inmunidad a {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horrores de la disformidad{/g}.
Gana +1 acumulación de Bendición oscura cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} o se ve afectada por {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains immunity to {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g}.
It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura gana inmunidad a Horrores de la disformidad. Gana +1 acumulación de Bendición oscura cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} o se ve afectada por {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text: この生物は<歪み>のホラーの無効化を獲得する。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}<歪み>のダメージ{/g} を受けているか、{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}の影響を受けている場合、その都度闇の祝福の累積 +1を獲得する。
languages.original_text: This creature gains immunity to Horrors of the Warp. It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は<歪み>のホラーの無効化を獲得する。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}<歪み>のダメージ{/g} を受けているか、{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}の影響を受けている場合、その都度闇の祝福の累積 +1を獲得する。

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Öteboyut Dehşetlerine{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazanır.
Her {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} aldığında veya {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}ruhsezi fenomeni{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerinden{/g} etkilendiğinde +1 kara lütuf birikimi kazanır.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains immunity to {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g}.
It gains +1 stack of dark blessing each time it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} or is affected by {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
